characters.name: Police Officer
characters.description: A police officer is available for questions regarding recent events.

characters.name: Receptionist
characters.description: The receptionist at the desk appears to want to speak to you.

characters.name: Mr. McMullen
characters.description: There is a man in a suit holding a sealed letter. What could it be?.

characters.name: Wallet Owner
characters.description: There is a man by the pool who made eye contact with you. He looks like he has something to tell you.

characters.name: Brent
characters.description: The first thing you see in the private poker room is Brent along with a few other men, sitting around the table.

characters.name: Lucca
characters.description: You step onto the roof of the hotel and someone who appears to be a hotel staff member catches your eye. He looks back at you.

characters.name: Little Girl
characters.description: There appears to be a girl, age 5 or 6, standing in the hallway waiting for someone.

characters.name: Lebron James
characters.description: The famous basketball player, Lebron James, is playing another person in basketball.

characters.name: Scottie Barnes
characters.description: Is that Scottie Barnes? You start blushing.
